name: Dimly Lit
description:
A top-down stealth-survival game for PC & Mac. Avoid capture from haunted spirits in a maze, using just your wits and flashlight to survive.

Controls:
WASD to Move
LMB to Use Flashlight
RMB to Activate / Deactivate Traps

Credits:
AB Biswas - Design, Programming, Production
Yanqi "Roy" Niu - Design, Programming, Tools
Joe Marchuk - Composition, Sound Design

Third Party Assets:
Nathan David Smith - W, A, S, D
Icon Solid - Mouse Left Click
